original_text: Immediately, Jesus put out his hand and he took hold of Peter. He said to Peter, ‘You should trust me more than you do. Why did you not believe that I could help you?’
korean_text: 예수께서 즉시 손을 내밀어 그를 붙잡으시며 이르시되 믿음이 작은 자여 왜 의심하였느냐 하시고

sentences.original_text: Immediately, Jesus put out his hand
and he took hold of Peter
You should trust me more than you do

sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 도울 수 있다는 것을
